concerning Inorero university pension scheme but their case is still in court. I told him to make a follow up there.
asked about tassociation a loan and a pension. I told him there is no connection; is entitled to his pension with or without tloan.
a quarter balance of his pension due to lack of money to take care of family which is not possible because has to attain tage of 50.

column1: Silvester had to confirm whether mbao pension was a genuine scheme and if it is registered with RBA. I assured him that it is registered with RBA.
was calling from Funyula Busia County. to join Mbao Pension Plan but had to ask in case dies before tthree years of saving her money with Mbao
column2: what would happen to her money. I told her on tMbao pension form there is a place where is supposed to write her next of kin and I it is her duty to inform him or her that is saving with mbao pension and that they are tnext of kin.

column1: Allan was calling from funyula Busia county. was asking if Mbao pension was genuine or a scam. was also asking how to start saving and how to withdraw. I informed him how genuine Mbao is and gave him Mbao pensions number which is 0729887587 to ask how to join tpension shceme.
was a former employee of Kenya Investment Authority. had launched a complaint with RBA and to do a follow up with Muhamed Muhidin of complaints department. I connected him to Muhamed Muhidin.
Richard was a from Siaya
column2: Ugenya County. to know where our offices are and how to join Mbao pension plan. I told him that we are at upper hill
column4: 13th and 14 floors. Regarding how to join Mbao pension
column5: I gave him Mbao pensions number which is 0729887587.

column1: was calling from Siaya County Ugenya sub-county. Irine to know if mbao pension is a genuine pension scheme. I informed her that Mbao pension scheme is under RBA
column4: Eagle Africa and Safaricom as custodian.

column1: was calling from Nandy County. is working with Ministry of Agriculture. James is about to retire and to start saving as an individual in an individual retirement benefit scheme. I send him a list of individual schemes to choose tone which will fit him to his email sainajk2007@yahoo.com

Timothy is a former employee of Scripture Union of Kenya. They were saving with ICEA lion but temployer was not remitting their pension to tscheme as from 2016 and 2017. I directed him to launch a complaint with RBA through our link which is portal.rba.go.ke

Pricilla Was calling from Nairobi. attended tSME expo at KICC and visited tRBA stand. However to join RBA. I explained to her that should join one of tindividual retirement benefit scheme registered with RBA. For more information
column2: I invited her to visit our offices at Rahimtulla Tower 13th floor.

column1: Eva was calling from Judiciary Training Institute. was requesting for preretirement training to be done at their institution since staff meeting next week. I advised her to do an official email to viola koskey at vkoskey@rba.go.ke and cc Christine at conyango@rba.go.ke
was calling from Ugenya
column2: Siaya county. joined Mbao pension two months ago and is satisfied. His friend Mr Okelo to join also but they dint have tregistration forms. I gave them Mbao pensions no which is 0729887587

column1: Muli used to work with City clock Kenya Limited. was saving Eagle Africa Provident Fund. After left City clock was given some money as pension so his question was did receive twhole amount for his pension. I informed him that dint get twhole amount since was not at tage of retirement.
was calling from Nairobi. was working at Panari Hotel and saving with ICEA lion for t9 month as from April 2018 to October 2019. After left twork
column2: went to ICEA to ask for his pension only to notice that Panari was not remitting tpension to them. I directed him to launch a complaint with us through portal.rba.go.ke

column1: Gordon was calling from Kariobagi Estate Nairobi County. is a member of Mbao pension plan since last year. had a complain that since they registered with Mbao pension
column2: they usually get their balance on their phones after they send tmoney to Eagle Africa but as from last week they don’t get it. I gave them Daniel Ouma’s number toffice who registered tfrom Mbao pension scheme.

column1: was calling from Gikomba market Nairobi county. to join Mbao pension but his question is if dies before tthree years what will happen to his savings. I told him that should write down his next kin and inform him or her just in case anything happens.
was calling from Nairobi county Gikomba market and to know tlocation of our office just in case Mbao pension collapses for them to come and complain to us. I directed them to upper hill

was calling from Strathmore University. to know some data in regards to scheme administrators and custodians. I told her that should request that officially through this email address research@rba.go.ke

used to work with Dosh Industries Limited Mombasa road. used to save with GA Insurance tadministrator were Robberts insurance. GA insurance had already issued a cheque for her pension payment to Dosh but they haven’t given it to her coz they demand her to clear with them first. I directed her to launch a complaint with RBA though portal@rba.go.ke to get assisted.
had filled twithdrwal from sunlam insurance to octagon pension scheme but it had taken longer than expected. I directed him to launch a complaint with RBA from twebsite.
